Uses of Class
entities.characters.AbstractChar

  • Packages that use AbstractChar 
    Package Description
    entities.characters  
    items.consumables  

    • Uses of AbstractChar in entities.characters

      Subclasses of AbstractChar in entities.characters 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Char
      This is the class that instantiates everything from the AbstractChar class.

    • Uses of AbstractChar in items.consumables

      Methods in items.consumables with parameters of type AbstractChar 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Consumable.apply(AbstractChar subject)
      This method applies the bonus of the item to a given target Character, modifying any stats as necessary.
      void HealthPotion.apply(AbstractChar subject)
      This method checks what the difference between the target's current HP and max HP is, and depending on the size of the difference does not apply (current HP is max), heals the target to full (difference between current and max HP is less than or equal to the mod stat), or heals the target for mod HP.
      abstract void AbstractTimedConsumable.apply(AbstractChar subject)
      This method, in addition to modifying the stats of a character, also adds the item to the list of durations in the Character's class.
      void DefensePotion.apply(AbstractChar subject)
      The DefensePotion's .apply() method sets the defense of the target character to their defense plus the mod stat of the DefensePotion, and runs the targets .addBonus() method to add the DefensePotion and its duration to their respective lists in the target.
      abstract void AbstractTimedConsumable.remove(AbstractChar subject)
      This method removes the bonus of the item from a particular Character, unmodifying stats and removing things from duration lists in the process.
      void DefensePotion.remove(AbstractChar subject)
      The DefensePotion's .remove() method sets the defense of the target character to their defense minus the mod stat of the DefensePotion.
